sense.def:
One's nose
je tisti del človeškega obraza, s katerim vohamo.

seg.quote: Johnny punched me in the nose.

sense.def:
The nose of a plane
je sprednji del letala.

Kadar se nekaj dogaja
under one's nose
, se dogaja pred človekom in bi mu moralo biti očitno.

seg.quote: Cheating was going on under the teacher's nose.
He had been sent to poke his nose into their business.
Country people have to pay through the nose for their goods.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
noses about
ali
noses around
, si ogleduje neki prostor ali kraj, da bi našel kaj zanimivega;

seg.quote: He nosed about among the boilers.
Stay outside the door and see that no one comes nosing around.
